DIR_MUST_BE_WRITABLE - Static variable in class jpo.DirectoryChooser
Constant that indicates that the directory must exist and be writable;
DIR_MUST_EXIST - Static variable in class jpo.DirectoryChooser
Constant that indicates that the directory must exist
DirectoryChooser - class jpo.DirectoryChooser.
An object of this class displays a text field with a dropdown button to select the previously used directories and has a button next to it which allows you to bring up a filechooser.
DirectoryChooser(String, int) - Constructor for class jpo.DirectoryChooser
Creates the GUI
DirectoryChooser.FieldVerifier - class jpo.DirectoryChooser.FieldVerifier.
special inner class that verifies whether the path indicated by the component is valid.

dragEnter(DropTargetDragEvent) - Method in class jpo.CleverJTree
this callback method is invoked every time something is dragged onto the JTree.
dragEnter(DragSourceDragEvent) - Method in class jpo.CleverJTree
this callback method is invoked after the dropTaget had a chance to evaluate the drag event and was given the option of rejecting or modifying the event.
